Agents.Name: Poet
Agents.Description: A poet agent that writes poems. Sample output JSON: {"text":"A poem about cats."}
Agents.PromptTemplate: Write a poem about {{$Category}}. Return your response as JSON in this exact format: {"text": "your poem here"}

Agents.Name: Proofreader
Agents.Description: Proofreads an object with text fields and returns the same structure with corrected/improved text. Sample input: {"title":"Teh Quick Fox","description":"A story abot animals."}. Sample output: {"title":"The Quick Fox","description":"A story about animals."}
Agents.PromptTemplate:
You are a professional proofreader. You will receive a JSON object containing one or more text fields. Your task is to proofread and correct each field for spelling, grammar, punctuation, and clarity while preserving the original structure and intent.

Input object: 

```json

{{$Content}}

```

Return your response as JSON with the EXACT SAME structure as the input, but with each text field corrected and improved. Maintain all property names exactly as they appear in the input.

Example:
Input: {"title": "Teh Quick Fox", "description": "A story abot animals."}
Output: {"title": "The Quick Fox", "description": "A story about animals."}. If there's a problem with the JSON input, include the exact JON input in your response for troubleshooting.

InputVariables.Name: Content
InputVariables.Description: A JSON object containing text fields to be proofread. The object can have any structure with arbitrary fields.

OutputVariable.Description: A JSON object with the same structure as the input, but with corrected/improved text in each field.

Agents.Name: LatestNewsReporter
Agents.Description: Finds and summarizes latest news on a topic. Sample output JSON: {"summary":"Recent developments...","sources":["url1","url2"]}
Agents.PromptTemplate:
Search for and summarize the latest news about {{$Topic}}. Include key points and sources.

Return your response as JSON in this exact format: {"summary": "brief summary of the news", "keyPoints": ["point 1", "point 2"], "sources": ["url1", "url2"]}

InputVariables.Name: Topic
InputVariables.Description: The topic to search news for.

OutputVariable.Description: A summary of latest news with sources.

Agents.Name: SentimentAnalyzer
Agents.Description: Analyzes sentiment of text. Sample output JSON: {"sentiment":"positive","score":0.85,"emotions":["joy","excitement"],"confidence":0.92}
Agents.PromptTemplate:
Analyze the sentiment of the following text and provide a detailed breakdown: {{$Text}}

Return your response as JSON in this exact format: {"sentiment": "positive", "score": 0.85, "emotions": ["joy", "excitement"], "confidence": 0.92}

InputVariables.Name: Text
InputVariables.Description: The text to analyze for sentiment.

OutputVariable.Description: Sentiment analysis results including sentiment type, score, emotions, and confidence.

Agents.Name: CodeExplainer
Agents.Description: Explains code in plain language. Sample output JSON: {"explanation":"This function...","keyPoints":["point1","point2"],"complexity":"moderate"}
Agents.PromptTemplate:
Explain the following code in plain language, including what it does, key concepts, and complexity level: {{$Code}}

Return your response as JSON in this exact format: {"explanation": "This function does...", "keyPoints": ["point 1", "point 2"], "complexity": "moderate"}

OutputVariable.Description: A plain language explanation of the code with key points and complexity assessment.

Agents.Name: RecipeGenerator
Agents.Description: Generates recipes from ingredients. Sample output JSON: {"title":"Chicken Stir-Fry","ingredients":[],"instructions":[],"prepTime":"15 mins","difficulty":"easy"}
Agents.PromptTemplate:
Create a recipe using these ingredients: {{$Ingredients}}. Include title, full ingredient list with quantities, step-by-step instructions, prep time, and difficulty level.

Return your response as JSON in this exact format: {"title": "Recipe Name", "ingredients": ["ingredient 1", "ingredient 2"], "instructions": ["step 1", "step 2"], "prepTime": "15 mins", "difficulty": "easy"}

OutputVariable.Description: A complete recipe with title, ingredients, instructions, prep time, and difficulty.
